divs: Sighting DetailsSitting in back deck facing north, at first seen light flying fast, looked like a shooting star, but then it slowed and floated across going north to south. There were 5 dull yellow lights that were diamond shaped. They were arranged inside of a very light silhouette. There was no sound at all and none of the lights on it were blinking. We were sitting on our back deck. We were looking out skyward. A shooting star but it slowed. Floated in a straight line north to south. Thougt is was just a military plane until no blinking lights were observed. It flew out of our view.
Summary: Dull lights floated over with duller silhouette.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Bethalto
There were no other sightings in Bethalto on or around September 24th 2010
